title: U.S. passenger-miles : Intercity/Amtrak 2007 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes U.S. passenger-miles in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general U.S. passenger-miles in millions has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum U.S. passenger-miles in millions, about 7283.0 was reported at Year 2013
Minimum U.S. passenger-miles in millions about 5784.0 was reached at Year 2007
